blogPost.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
blogPost.body: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
blogPost.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Enombic是一款用于设计自己的自定义股指，投资股指，并与朋友分享的产品。重新组合ARK ETF，市值加权WSB符号，或 "分叉 "SPY并设置您自己的自定义权重。然后，就可以一键投资了!
Enombic是一款用於設計自己的自定義股指，投資股指，並與朋友分享的產品。重新組合ARK ETF，市值加權WSB符號，或 "分叉 "SPY並設置您自己的自定義權重。然後，就可以一鍵投資了!

previous.excerpt: Your favorite tool for sales, marketing, and customer support - erxes - is now available on the go. Keep the ball rolling at any time by managing deals, responding to messages, and updating your CRM. For busy days on the go, erxes mobile is the way to go.
previous.title: erxes Mobile - Some of the most important CRM and web chat tools on the go

localize.description: 您最喜爱的销售、营销和客户支持工具--erxes--现在可以随身携带。通过管理交易、回复信息和更新您的 CRM，随时保持球滚动。对于忙碌的日子，移动版 erxes 是您的最佳选择。
localize.tagline: 一些最重要的客户关系管理和网络聊天工具在路上。

localize.description: 您最喜愛的銷售、營銷和客戶支持工具--erxes--現在可以隨身攜帶。通過管理交易、回覆信息和更新您的 CRM，隨時保持球滾動。對於忙碌的日子，移動版 erxes 是您的最佳選擇。
localize.tagline: 一些最重要的客戶關係管理和網絡聊天工具在路上。

next.excerpt: Tweet Peep 👀 gives you instant, one-click access to what other people are saying about the articles and videos you're browsing. It shortens the great-minds-think-alike process. Let's peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter!
next.title: Tweet Peep - Peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 让您可以一键访问其他人对您正在浏览的文章和视频的评价。它缩短了伟大的头脑--想法--相似的过程。让我们在Twitter上偷看别人对媒体的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窥视其他人对媒体的想法。

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 讓您可以一鍵訪問其他人對您正在瀏覽的文章和視頻的評價。它縮短了偉大的頭腦--想法--相似的過程。讓我們在Twitter上偷看別人對媒體的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窺視其他人對媒體的想法。
